captions.text: The messages this season complete the previous seasons, they do not contradict them.
Guide us to the Straight Path
Hobbies Refine Pasion
Does following the Straight Path require one to spend all of their time working?
Or is balance part of living?

Part of this balance is rest.
Hobbies are positive ways to rest
We're here at a club for RC planes in Jeddah
They have planes like this which people can buy or build themselves
And they fly them remotely, that's the hobby

-If I messed around what would happen?
-It might break

-How long does it take to learn?
-Minimum of 2 weeks up to a month or two
I thought I was gonna come and fly today
So all of these are models of real planes?

-The bigger the plane the harder it is?
-It's actually easier

Here's a war plane, nice
It's quite light
What's this plane's name?
It's an ME262, a German plane, the first jet engine aircraft to be used in WWII
You'll notice that everybody here learns from the hobby
Let's say you're an electrician, you'll see that these people might know more about electricity than you do
Part of the hobby is putting the plane together, troubleshooting the problems, not just flying
He can tell you about thrust, electricity, physics, all kinds of sciences
They learn this from their hobby
There are many hobbies, some that need resources and money
Others just need things from nature
Mr Younis has an interesting hobby where he stacks rocks on each other
There's no glue. Nothing but gravity to hold them together
Look, that's precision

Younis has this simple hobby
How long do you think it took him to stack the two rocks?
You need time, focus, and a sense of gravity
Drawing is a traditional hobby, but not all traditional hobbies have to be so
You can take a known hobby and make it your own
Here in Tokyo Mr Hamasan will show us
Let's time him
Okay, it took him 7 and a half minutes
He's gonna take a picture and post it on Instagram
He would see pictures on the internet but wonder how good it really was
He couldn't see the inspiration for it
So he decided to sketch and then post it with the original image so that we can compare
And now it's his hobby, he's been doing it for 10 years
One benefit of hobbies is that they can become businesses
Work, a career, financial gains
Walter in America used to draw since he was 4, only as a hobby
He took part in WWI, filling his free time, even in the war, with drawing
The war ended and he went home and worked a few jobs
Until he stared a company for his hobby, an animation company
He turned this hobby of his into work, and he drew one of the most famous cartoon characters ever
Mickey Mouse

Everybody knows Mickey Mouse, 
and it all started with a guy who liked to draw
His hobby became his job, which became what we know as Walt Disney
Disney now makes $40 billion in profit

Disney employs 150,000 people
It has created employment opportunities

Hobbies can have an economical impact
They can become a source of revenue
His arms are getting a work out, doing this for an hour
Some hobbies expand our minds and help us think

One 17 year old learns languages as a hobby
Every few weeks he'll learn a new one
Imagine this 17 year old, how many languages do you think he speaks?
Just as a hobby
He says that with every language he learns his brain capacity increases, and the next language is easier
He reached a stage where he learned Arabic, a difficult language to learn...
He learned the letters in 4 days, and could read within a week
As you can see he can speak decent Arabic
He said that he's not a genius, but he has found a hobby that relieves him of stress
Imagine learning a language to blow off steam

I appreciate his patience
Look at how long he worked to do that
It took him half an hour, just for this
Hobbies teach patience, precision, perfection, and balance
The best part is, it's free, anybody can do it
I'm gonna try one, it took him two seconds
I'm gonna take these glasses off, this needs focus
This is going to be a long day
Ron has been metal detecting since 1983

He goes to beaches, rivers, deserts, even cities
Looking for precious metals
He's found all kinds of metal, coins, gold, jewelry
Part of the fun is finding a coin, for example, that's 300-400 years old
And to think that you're the first person to touch it since its original owner 300 years ago
He finds enjoyment in that
Once again, everybody finds joy in their hobbies

Ron also finds economic gain in his hobby 
because he finds treasures
Sometimes he collects them, but sometimes he sells for a profit
If you want to quit a bad habit, start a good one
One problem people face when they try to quit a bad habit is that they don't have anything to fall back on
Which causes a gap. When there's a gap they relapse back into the bad habit
A golden rule to stop any bad habit, whether it's smoking, drinking, etc.,
is to fill the gap from quitting the bad habit with good habits, which include hobbies.
We spontaneously came across another habit while filming for the 'housing' episode,
We met this senior citizen in the United Kingdom whose hobby is to build tracks for model trains
He creates the landscapes and saws wood for the tracks, it's really interesting
Hobbies discipline and refine our passions
Hobbies [hiwaya] come from a word for passion [hawa] and mean something that interests you
One of the advantages of hobbies is that they refine our inclinations,
Instead of investing in inclinations that are haram [forbidden] or destructive,
Hobbies direct this inclination into passion for something righteous.
This lets a person vent stress and anger
A hobby is a positive method of venting and refreshing people is the midst of their busy lives
Patience drives perfection
Just a tiny bit
A lot of young people like jet skis, it's a widespread hobby, just like any other
Someone also loved flying, so he made his own hobby
He made, I can't even explain
He said he likes jet skis and flying, how can I do both together?
So he invented a skateboard connected to a propulsion system that allows him to fly
He invented a beautiful thing as a hobby, originally for personal use, and his friends
And he hopes to expand into a business one day

But what you see is just a hobby
It's something new and very nice. I like it

I think this is going to need an entire season
Maybe Khawater 11
